The work shown can be attributed to the style of Hellenistic Greece because of which of the following characteristics?

choices.label: The use of a canon of proportions to produce a perfected male form
The depiction of the psychological effects of defeat to elicit an emotional response from the viewer
The stylized treatment of the body to make it appropriate for use in a timeless funerary context
The inclusion of exaggerated signs of intense aging to foster respect for wisdom and experience

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Justify an attribution of a work of art by explaining similarities with work by a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
